tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (VP (ADVP (RB Just)) (VBG leaving) (NP (DT th) (NN ER)) (PP (IN after) (S (VP (VBG being) (PP (ADVP (RB here)) (IN for) (NP (NP (CD 4) (NNS hours)) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT the) (NN stomach) (NN flu))))) (PP (IN from) (NP (NN hell))))))) (. .)))
